extendedIngredients.name: cucumbers
extendedIngredients.original: 8 Persian cucumbers (about 4 cups) skin on, chopped (you can use 3 regular cukes, but you must scrape the seeds from those..)

title: Glorious Gazpacho
summary: Need a gluten free and dairy free main course? Glorious Gazpacho could be an outstanding recipe to try. This recipe serves 2 and costs $13.59 per serving. One serving contains 1377 calories, 79g of protein, and 3g of fat. Head to the store and pick up tomato juice, seasoned rice wine vinegar, garlic, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the kosher salt you could follow this main course with the Low Fat Crumbs Cake (Kosher-Dairy) as a dessert. 36 people were glad they tried this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 45 minutes. It will be a hit at your Summer event. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 98%. This score is outstanding. Try Glorious Greens, Glorious Layered Desserts Cookbook, and Glorious Red, White, and Blue Cake for similar recipes.
